dcterms:creator: N. V. Chawla
K. W. Bowyer
L. O. Hall
W. P. Kegelmeyer
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of 3,162 tracked data points for 70 typhoons between 2006-2016. Each data track is labelled into 4 classes (TD: tropical depression, TS: tropical storm, TY: typhoon and ST: super typhoon). The typhoon data also includes time-stamp, location, maximum wind speed (VMAX), wind intensity (RAD) and sea level pressure (MSLP).
dcterms:title: JTWC Best-tracked (typhoons environmental data)

dcterms:description: To search and retrieve typhoon-related tweets, we executed keywords queries based on related typhoon terminology such as typhoon and typhoon names (e.g., Haiyan).
dcterms:title: Typhoon Tweets

dcterms:creator: T. Mikolov
I. Sutskever
K. Chen
G. S. Corrado
J. Dean
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 1.6 million labeled tweets with binary sentiments (positive/negative).
dcterms:title: Stanford NLP Sentiment140

dcterms:description: An updated disaster dataset that includes typhoons environmental data and their tweets up-to 2018.
dcterms:title: TED (updated disaster dataset)
